bill.title: Relating To The Hilo Community Economic District.
bill.description: Establishes the Hilo Community Economic District as a community development district located in East Hawaii under the Hawaii Community Development Authority. Establishes the Hilo Community Economic Revolving Fund. Repeals on the earliest of 6/30/2037, inclusion of lands within the District within a redevelopment area, or establishment of a special improvement district that encompasses the lands within the District. Effective 7/1/2050. (SD2)

history.action: Introduced and Pass First Reading.
Referred to EDB/TOU, WAL, FIN, referral sheet 6
Bill scheduled to be heard by EDB/TOU on Friday, 02-03-17 9:00AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on EDB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Keohokalole, Holt, Johanson, Yamashita, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Takumi.

The committees on TOU recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Onishi, Tokioka, Cachola, Choy, Ohno, Woodson, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Ito.
Reported from EDB/TOU (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 71) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to WAL.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on WAL with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Oshiro excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by WAL on Friday, 02-10-17 9:00AM in House conference room 325.

The committees on WAL recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamane, Kong, Cullen, Evans, Ichiyama, Lowen; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Say; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) C. Lee, Fukumoto.
Reported from WAL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 565) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.
Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) DeCoite, Tokioka excused (2).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 02-22-17 2:00PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Cullen, Cachola, DeCoite, Gates, Holt, Keohokalole, Kobayashi, LoPresti, Lowen, Nakamura, Tokioka, Quinlan, Yamashita, Tupola, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Choy.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 770), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Ichiyama excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 70).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to ETT/WTL, WAM.
The committee(s) on ETT/WTL has scheduled a public hearing on 03-20-17 2:45PM in conference room 414.

The committee(s) on ETT recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in ETT were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Wakai, Galuteria, L. Thielen; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Taniguchi, Baker.

The committee(s) on WTL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WTL were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) K. Rhoads, L. Thielen; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Inouye ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard, Kim.
Reported from ETT/WTL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1149) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 04-06-17 9:30AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 8 Aye(s): Senator(s) Tokuda, Dela Cruz, Harimoto, Inouye, K. Kahele, Riviere, Shimabukuro, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) English, Galuteria, Taniguchi.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1587) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 04-11-17.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 661) in amended form (SD 2).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
House Conferees Appointed: Nakashima, Onishi, Yamane, Cullen Co-Chairs; Ward.
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 585).
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 586).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Wakai Chair; K. Rhoads, K. Kahele Co-Chairs; Kidani.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 680).

Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Friday, 04-28-17 at 3:30PM in Conference Room 309.
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Friday, 04-28-17 at 4:30 PM in Conference Room 309.
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Friday, 04-28-17 5:30PM in Conference Room 309.
Carried over to 2018 Regular Session.
Senate Conferee(s) discharged.
Received notice of all Senate conferees being discharged (Sen. Com. No. 1).
House Conferee(s) discharged.
Received notice of discharge of conferees (Hse. Com. No. 385).
